hp2: Our company provides shoes and sandals from famous brands such as Hoka, New Balance and Uniqlo with a variety of quality and style.
hp2_2: With modern design and advanced technology, these products bring comfort and support to users in all activities.
hp4: When joining the company, employees will enjoy a series of attractive benefits, including a systematic training program to improve their skills.
hp4_2: In addition, there are many allowances, insurance policies, periodic salary increases, along with valuable gifts and encouraging rewards.
dc2: Lo D - Binh Minh Industrial Park, My Hung 2 Hamlet, My Hoa Commune, Binh Minh Town, Vinh Long Province
